title: WHIRLING F1 ORB / dialogue home
description: where is home, what is home afterthought

dialogueTree.title: Encyclopedia: "By the way, where *is* home? The ad..."
dialogueTree.text: By the way, where *is* home? The address is coming up blank and this place sure isn't it...

links.title: You: "Do I even have one?"
links.text: Do I even have one?

links.title: Encyclopedia: "But you've been at this hostel-cafe..."
links.text: But you've been at this hostel-cafeteria for only three nights. Where were you before? You had to be somewhere.

links.title: You: "I don't know... near? South maybe."
links.text: I don't know... near? South maybe.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "You don't really know, do you?"
links.text: You don't really know, do you?

links.title: You: "I don't. Does this mean I'm homeles..."
links.text: I don't. Does this mean I'm homeless?

links.title: Encyclopedia: ""South maybe" doesn't sound like so..."
links.text: "South maybe" doesn't sound like somewhere you can stay if you run out of money.

links.title: You: "Could I trace the way back somehow?..."
links.text: Could I trace the way back somehow? To the exact street, the exact number on a building...

links.title: Encyclopedia: "You can try. Run some addresses in..."
links.text: You can try. Run some addresses in your head when you get the time. Maybe a street or an apartment will appear.

links.title: You: "I'll live in a dumpster, I don't ca..."
links.text: I'll live in a dumpster, I don't care. Fuck everything. Hobocop.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Entertain the thought when you get..."
links.text: Entertain the thought when you get the time. Maybe being a hobo *and* a cop has its advantages?

links.title: You: "I have only a vague, blackened imag..."
links.text: I have only a vague, blackened image.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "A vague, blackened image doesn't so..."
links.text: A vague, blackened image doesn't sound like somewhere you can stay if you run out of money.

links.title: You: "Far away?"
links.text: Far away?

links.title: Encyclopedia: "In time or space?"
links.text: In time or space?

links.title: You: "In time."
links.text: In time.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "That doesn't sound like somewhere y..."
links.text: That doesn't sound like somewhere you can stay if you run out of money.

links.title: You: "In space."
links.text: In space.

links.title: You: "Both."
links.text: Both.

links.title: You: "Up on Marvel Hill."
links.text: Up on Marvel Hill.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Why did you say that?"
links.text: Why did you say that?

links.title: You: "These are just synapses firing. It..."
links.text: These are just synapses firing. It doesn't mean anything.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "You don't really know, do you?"
links.text: You don't really know, do you?

links.title: You: "I don't. Does this mean I'm homeles..."
links.text: I don't. Does this mean I'm homeless?

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Something produced by the random fi..."
links.text: Something produced by the random firing of synapses doesn't sound like a place you can stay if you run out of money.

links.title: You: "I have only a vague, blackened imag..."
links.text: I have only a vague, blackened image.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "A vague, blackened image doesn't so..."
links.text: A vague, blackened image doesn't sound like somewhere you can stay if you run out of money.

links.title: You: "The name must have some meaning for..."
links.text: The name must have some meaning for me.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "The old thesaurus comes up empty. M..."
links.text: The old thesaurus comes up empty. Maybe you should ask the lieutenant.

links.title: You: ""Lieutenant Kitsuragi, do you know..."
links.text: "Lieutenant Kitsuragi, do you know a place called Marvel Hill?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No..." He thinks for a moment. "Bu..."
links.text: "No..." He thinks for a moment. "But isn't that an expression, not a place?"

links.title: You: ""An expression?""
links.text: "An expression?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""A saying. Up on Marvel Hill -- a g..."
links.text: "A saying. Up on Marvel Hill -- a great, high place. One that is impossible to climb back to."

links.title: You: "I really don't remember."
links.text: I really don't remember.

links.title: You: "As I said, I don't think I have one..."
links.text: As I said, I don't think I have one.

links.title: You: "I have no idea."
links.text: I have no idea.

links.title: You: "[Discard thought.]"
links.text: [Discard thought.]
